Address.Address1: 15 Avenue de la Creativite, Parc des Moulins

Description.Text: Kyriad Lille est Villeneuve d'Ascq is a comfortable 3-star property offering relaxed accommodation in east Lille. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, onsite dining and a good location near Parc du Heron. Villeneuve-d'Ascq is situated east of Lille, and is one of the main cities of the Lille metropolitan area. Nearby places of interest include V2 shopping mall, Golf de Brigode, Stade Pierre-Mauroy and Lille Metropole Musee d'Art Moderne. The hotel is housed in a 20th-century mid-rise building. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a simple, modern style. Amenities include satellite TV and a work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The hotel restaurant serves French specialities in a welcoming atmosphere, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
